CustomField.description: JSON array defining routing logic. Evaluates conditions in order and routes to the first one met. Conditions use semantic references to check output from previous nodes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON array of routing rules. Example: [{"condition": "$node1_check_status.isSuccess == true", "nextNode": "success_node"}, {"condition": "true", "nextNode": "failure_node"}]. The last rule should have "condition": "true" as a default path.
CustomField.label: Conditional Edges (Routing)
